mapper.update: update category set name = #{name} , parentId = #{parentId} , category_order = #{categoryOrder}, update_date=#{updateDate} where category_ID = #{category_ID}
mapper.select: select category_ID, name, parentId, createDate, update_date as "updateDate", category_order as "categoryOrder" from category where category_ID = #{category_ID}
select a.name, a.category_ID from category a where a.parentId = 0
